title: Embedded intelligence
description: Add smarts to your objects by embedding our advanced algorithms, including acoustic and vibratory signature analysis

title: Secure network communication
description: Increase the volume of application data sent, secure your data exchanges and improve the quality of service of LPWAN networks with our SCAP / LTP network stack

title: Data collection
description: Easily and rapidly collect your data from providers (Sigfox and LoRaWANTM) via HL2 Panorama, our scalable and interoperable IoT platform
